segments.text: I see the woman standing at the sink, intently polishing a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her focus is so absorbed that she doesn't notice the water spilling over from the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It amazes me how unaware she is of the chaos brewing around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a knot in my stomach at the thought of what might happen if she slips.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful and serene, almost mocking the turmoil inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think about how a simple dishwashing task has turned into a potential disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle keeps growing, and I wonder when she'll finally look down.
segments.speaker: PAR
